scripts.merge: echo 'Enter current branch :' && read currentBranch && echo 'Enter the branch you want to merge :' && read mergeBranch && git checkout $mergeBranch && git pull origin $mergeBranch && git checkout $currentBranch && git merge origin $mergeBranch && git checkout $mergeBranch && git merge origin $currentBranch && git push origin $mergeBranch $currentBranch && git checkout $currentBranch
